Summary: Looked like a disc but all i could see was blue lights and red lights strobing
divs: Sighting DetailsI was hanging out in my room, when for some reason i felt the need to look out the window, in the northwest sky there were strobing lights i watched this thing for a good 20min as it slowly seemed to drift, they were blue and red and they would change beats. like they were sending a morse code. Luckily i had a pair of binoculars by (not that great but better than nothing). I was able to make out that it had what appeared to be a disc shape. I could see the Colors of the strobe even better.When I first saw it i knew it wasnt a plane or helicopter for the meer fact it was staying pretty much in the same place. However I did notice that it was slowly moving.(there were powerlines in the line of view, when i first saw it, it was above them, then over 20min it moved to where it was below the powerlines. All it did was move real slow and keep strobing. I knew I would see one soon, i think thats what lead me to the window. It eventually went over a building. I was hoping it would move around real quick like the report in Oceanside. But all it did this time was move slowly. I also noticed that there 2 planes that went flying in its direction, i also saw them flying back after. This was not too far from LAX, so i bet they picked something up on the radar.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 14th 2009
